TopicTitle: How are you Gentleman? My name is Starsy!

Articles.Content:
Hello! My name is Starsy. My Steam is Starsy S. Knight. and Im madly in love with KSP. I started the game after watching lots of Lets Plays and Just recently Perfected a Spaceplane. I Have played the demo before (After a failed mun Landing, I got in orbit around the sun) And I hope to be a great part of the Community.

QUESTIONS:

How do I rotate Finely? I can only used the wasd and qe to rotate roughly.

Are there other destinations to find other than the KSP station and the Island Hangar?

Is there any Kerban Lore/History?

Thanks in advance, Love you all

How do I rotate Finely? I can only used the wasd and qe to rotate roughly.
Hold down the shift key while hitting WASDQE.

Are there other destinations to find other than the KSP station and the Island Hangar?
There are many other, well, things to find, but only one other "destination" of that sort.

Is there any Kerban Lore/History?
None. Make up your own.

Hello! My name is Starsy. My Steam is Starsy S. Knight. and Im madly in love with KSP. I started the game after watching lots of Lets Plays and Just recently Perfected a Spaceplane. I Have played the demo before (After a failed mun Landing, I got in orbit around the sun) And I hope to be a great part of the Community.

Welcome!

Hold down the shift key while hitting WASDQE.

You can also press Caps Lock to toggle fine controls (for rotation and translation) without the need for holding a modifier.

So I saw the title, and....

Captain: What happen ?

Mechanic: Somebody set up us the bomb.

Operator: We get signal.

Captain: What !

Operator: Main screen turn on.

CATS: How are you gentlemen !!
